message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it! I'm offering it to you for $175. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $120 is lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $140? It's a fair price considering the value of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $130? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to make sure I can afford this product.
